title: High Bronze - Silver Ranked team RECRUITMENT
body:
Yo so right now we are looking for: 
High Bronze - Silver Jungler Main
AND
High Bronze - Silver Support Main
If interested comment you're main champs and role.
-------
Also must have skype for communication
Thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey, I'm a silver 4 that mains support and looking for a ranked team. I main Braum with a win rate of 67% after 50 games. I also main Janna, Blitz and Naut

Add me and message me on league if you want to talk :). Thanks!
Sorry we got a jungler we are now looking for a main support

IGN: CastielZaim11 

I'm currently in Bronze 3 and have been looking to join a team for ages.
I main jungle with Shyvana, but can use just about every champ with a lil practice.
I can supp with Blitz and Soraka and I have skype to communicate even better with the team. {{champion:102}}

IGN: Irenaeus

Rank: In Bronze 2, Currently in promos to Bronze 1

Main Jg and Sup, But can fill any role

Main Udyr Jungle, Can use most junglers though

Main Thresh/Leona Support, can use Janna and Morgana too
there is no such thing as high bronze. bronze is bronze. l3l

Hello, i can fill both of these rolls without a problem

IGN: False Pretense

Rank: Silver 5

Jungle: Vi , Wukong, Udyr, Lee Sin, Volibear, Jarvan IV, Fizz

Support: Thresh, Blitzcrank , Karma, Leona, Sona, Janna, Annie, Braum,
